name: En Tactico
description: The strategy is our everything. In this tactical theater of figures you have to go on your heads. Move your figure to destroy all enemy figures on the level to pass to the next test. Your enemies are card figures that you can defeat by going over them from the back or side. This also applies to your character.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: DualCore Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512mb Storage: 70 MB available space
